thread.title: BRIEF-Sparkle Roll Group ‍Enters MoU For Acquisition Of A Property Holding Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sparkle Roll Group ‍Enters MoU For Acquisition Of A Property Holding Co

organizations.name: brief-sparkle roll group ‍enters mou for acquisition of a property holding co

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Sparkle Roll Group Ltd:
* ‍ENTERED MOU IN RESPECT OF A POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF A PROPERTY HOLDING COMPANY​
* TO ‍PAY A REFUNDABLE AMOUNT OF RMB20 MILLION​ * ENTERED MOU WITH QI JIAN HONG AND BEIJING WENFU HENGYE TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF TARGET CO
* CONSIDERATION FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION SHALL BE NO LESS THAN RMB624.86 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
